text: Md. Riaz Uddin Ahmed is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Lalmonirhat-3. ==Career== Chowdhury was elected to parliament from Lalmonirhat-3 as an independent candidate in 1988. was elected to parliament from Lalmonirhat-3 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1991. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Md. Riaz Uddin Ahmed
